maths
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  maths.Matrix
Direct Known Subclasses:
StateVector
public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object

Dense representation of a matrix, includes methods for basic matrix algebra

Author:
Ewan Hemingway

Constructor Detail

Matrix

public Matrix(int r,
              int c,
              java.lang.String type)
Create a matrix of dimensions r x c

Parameters:
r - number of rows
c - number of columns
type - type of matrix to be generated, possibles are 'hadamard', 'identity', 'zero', 'not'. Default case is zero-filled matrix

tensorProductArray

public static Matrix tensorProductArray(Matrix[] matrixArray)
Tensor products each element in an array of matrices with the next. In particular used to generate matrix for n-qubit register.
